alert.note: Alert for Logan; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 9:47PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Logan, northwestern Custer, southwestern Blaine and southeastern Thomas Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 946 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Halsey, or 12 miles southeast of Thedford, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Shanklin Bluff, Tarboz Lake, Hoagland and Brown Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 near mile marker 238. Highway 83 between mile markers 128 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
